Name:
USS Croatan
HMS Fencer
Commissioned:
20 February 1943 and immediately transferred under lend lease to the Royal Navy
20 February 1943
Fate: Sold as a merchant ship; scrapped 1975
Class and type:
Bogue-class escort carrier (USA)
Attacker-class escort carrier (UK)
Armament:
2 × 4"/50, 5"/38 or 5"/51 guns
8 × Bofors 40-mm AA guns
20 × Oerlikon 20-mm AA guns
Operations:
Battle of the Atlantic (1943–44)
Operation Tungsten (1944)
